attributes.action: set up manufacturing facilities to make products that can be used by government departments so that they do not have to buy from companies that charge extornonate fees for products that they know the government wil have to pay
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: At the moment government bodies like education and health have to pay over the odds for products that they require in their departments. for example i work in a hospital and they have to buy urine pots by the thousands and the cheapest supplier cahrges over two pounds each for them where they are only pence to make. by the government manufacturing their own products they can produce jobs and get products cheaper and make more money to put back in services
